Articles.Content:
Hey there!

In the past time, I got a bit into building spaceplanes and decided to build some planes to explore Kerbin. I built 3 planes, actually these are two, that you can use for Stunts, flying around on Kerbin, and getting those 'Perform visual survey...' contracts!

Here is a picture of all three standing together:

Each plane has their own perks, the left one having the ability to fly sharp maneuvers, the plane in the mid is just the same, with more fuel at the cost of maneuverability and the one on the right has a little cargo bay for all your science needs, it also has two VTOL engines and a docking port to put little rovers on it, for example. The difference between Center of Mass and Dry Center of Mass is only 23cm!

And here is a video of me presenting them:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RarMWTh8w2k

Here is the download link, consisting of all 3 planes and a little Rover as an example for the uses of the CloudBreaker 2. Have fun!

https://www.dropbox.com/s/fp5dlbd6w7...r%20I.zip?dl=0

Edited January 19, 2015 by Volcanix
Included download link!
I would love to download these, very cool!

I would love to download these, very cool!

Thank you!

Here you go:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/fp5dlbd6w7kbi2k/CloudBreaker%20I.zip?dl=0

I will also include the link up there.

The link is for a .zip with all three planes, including a little rover as an example for the uses of the CloudBreaker 2 (the one on the right) docking port. It's not really good aligned however, but let the magnets do the job.

Let me know how they work, and have fun!

And which mods do u use?

Loading failure ... Parts missing...

And which mods do u use?

Loading failure ... Parts missing...

I don't use any part-changing mods.

I use:

ActiveTextureManagement

CameraTools

CollisionFX

EditorExtensions

Kerbal Engineer Redux (no parts of that on the planes)

ModuleManager

RCS Build Aid

TextureReplacer

and WheelSounds

I don't know why it doesn't work, sorry :/

I'm busy at the moment doing a presentation for school, I will try to load it later without mods and notify you then.

Ah, good to hear that!

Let me know how you like them and how they perform Have fun
I usae it with FAR and they perform good

I usae it with FAR and they perform good

Oh wow, nice to hear that! I didn't think they would work fine with FAR.
